name: Westin's Sandwich Saga
description:
Chonky bird has gone mad! Once eating a mysterious sandwich he  wanted more and became corrupt! It is now up to you to collect the sandwich components,  become stronger and defeat Chonky bird!

Controls:

Jump:                                           Up arrow/Spacebar/W

Move Left/Right:                  Right and Left arrow keys / A and D

Shoot:                                         Left Mouse button

Pause:                                         Escape
